overview: Chena Mukh Ochena Thikana is a Bengali romantic play starring Irfan Sazzad and Sarika. Abir and Tuli are in search of the perfect life partner and one day they accidentally meet at a bag store. They start liking each other but forget to introduce themselves or exchange numbers. Will their romance have a happy ending?
title: Chena Mukh Ochena Thikana
